description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Revive me next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...
name: The Undying
